RegisterHandler - Class in handler
Handler responsible to handle the http request for a new user to register.

RegisterRequest - Class in request
Represents the request object for creating a new registration for a new user.

Constructs the registration request from the new user.
RegisterResult - Class in result
Represents the result returned from the register request.

Constructs the result of the user registering from the request
RegisterService - Class in service
Service for new user registration.
